markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Zura (The Vampire Queen)](/Deities.aspx?ID=83)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 126 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Zura, the Vampire Queen, is the demon lord of blood, cannibalism, and vampires. According to legend, she is the reincarnated form of an Azlanti queen who indulged in blood rites and acts of cannibalism in a quest for eternal life. After death, she was reborn as a unique vampiric succubus who quickly ascended to the status of demon lord. Though many of her cults died out with the Azlanti empire, Zura is still worshipped by vampires and those aspiring to become vampires, particularly within Cheliax and Ustalav, as well as among the drow of the Darklands.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** Drink blood, seek vampirism, cause bleed damage

**Anathema** Expose vampires, heal a bloody wound without drinking blood from it first

**Area of Concern**
blood, cannibalism, and vampires

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6)

**Favored Weapon** [Rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36)

**Domains** [Delirium](/Domains.aspx?ID=43), [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=16), [Nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=23), [Undeath](/Domains.aspx?ID=34)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34)

- **4th**
[Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129)

- **6th**
[Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87)

</column>
name: Zura (The Vampire Queen)
